p: Specimens of T. procumbens were collected in Fazendinha district (00° 02′23″S and 51° 06′29″ O) in Macapá-Amapá Municipality. Two samples of the species were deposited in the Amapaense Herbarium (HAMAB) of the Institute of Scientific and Technological Research of the State of Amapá (IEPA) under registration number 019178.
